attributes.action: Posthumously award Bill Shankly a knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bill Shankly is the founder of modern day Liverpool Football Club. He was the first Liverpool manager to win the FA cup. He also brought the glory days back for Liverpool. If it was not for Shankly, Liverpool might never have become the most successful English club domestically and in Europe as well.

rejection.details: Sorry but we are no longer accepting requests for posthumous awards.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
